page.title: 16Memorial Hall
page.content: The{Memorial Hall}is in{Hook.}It was built in{1919}as a Memorial to the residents of{Hook}who died in the{ {First World War}.It is well used by the present villagers.Its affairs are looked after by a management committee and a caretaker looks after the cleaning and the leasing of the Hall. The{Village Playgroup}meets in the Hall every{Tuesday}and{Friday morning. Every other{Thursday afternoon}it is used by the{Local Health Service}for a {Baby}and{School Clinic.}This means that mothers do not have to take their children into Goole.The{Youth Club} also meets in the Hall.It is used by the local{Church}for concerts and coffee evenings and every{Friday {Evenings}there is a Bingo arranged.It can also be used for{Childrens {Parties. { }
